extensionDescription.message: You will be able to create and automatically insert templates for each account.

option_label_account_remark.message:
If you select an account and set the template, the settings for each account will be used.
If there is no setting value for each account, the "common" setting value is used.

option_label_template_body_remark.message:
If you enable HTML tags, put a "
" tag where you want a line break.
